Author: brett
Content: Yeah. I started with a require 'hpricot' line and then took it out when I realized pg does not put any classes or other identifying attributes in his html. CSS selectors and XPaths with just html elements seem hard to read. "td td u a" does not look so hot to me. Regexs are pretty easy.

Content: this might have been easier using hpricot, rubyful soup, scrapi, scrupyt, or something like that.
